name: Heli Attack: Strike Gunner War
description:
Heli Attack: Strike Gunner War is the best helicopter transporter in range of tiny striker but you flying. The full military action could be devastating, resulting in a full-scale war. A covert operation has been approved to hit the enemies targeting their bases, destroying their logistic and destroying their weapon systems.
Features of game:

User friendly GUI and controls.
Most realistic gunshot sounds.
The most amazing 3D battle field environment.
Aircraft flying experience in real 3D environment.
Helicopter flying without control of gunner.
Real and beautiful graphics of war area.
Grenade launcher and Gatling guns to shoot.
Natural look of militare vehicles.
